Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.summary: Automatically promote tar file header with zero value for type flag
Issue.description: The chaincode package parser expects the files in the tar.gz to have their header's typeflag set to 'TypeReg'. The tar writer utility in core/container/util/writer.go creates a header without setting the typeflag, thus defaulting to the zero value 'TypeRegA'. Automatically promoting 'TypeRegA' to 'TypeReg' or 'TypeDir' is the default behavior in go 1.11, so this task will add this functionality for now until we have moved to go 1.11.
